verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H7799>Shoshannim,<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H4905>Maschil,<s%> A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H3039>loves.<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H7370>gushing<s%> a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>matter:<s%> I <S%H559>speak<s%> of the things which I have <S%H4639>made<s%> touching the <S%H4428>king:<s%> my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is the <S%H5842>pen<s%> of a <S%H4106>ready<s%> <S%H5608>writer.<s%>

You are <S%H3302>fairer<s%> than the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men:<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> is <S%H3332>poured<s%> into your <S%H8193>lips:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
<S%H2296>Gird<s%> your <S%H2719>sword<s%> on your <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> O most <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> with your <S%H1935>glory<s%> and your <S%H1926>majesty.<s%>

And in your <S%H1926>majesty<s%> <S%H7392>ride<s%> <S%H6743>prosperously<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H1697><s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H6037>meekness<s%> and <S%H6664>righteousness;<s%> and your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> you <S%H3372>terrible<s%> things.
Your <S%H2671>arrows<s%> are <S%H8150>sharp<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H341>enemies;<s%> whereby the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> you.
Your <S%H3678>throne,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> is for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever:<s%> the <S%H7626>scepter<s%> of your <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> is a <S%H4334>right<s%> <S%H7626>scepter.<s%>

You <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7562>wickedness:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> has <S%H4886>anointed<s%> you with the <S%H8081>oil<s%> of <S%H8342>gladness<s%> above your <S%H2270>fellows.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> your <S%H899>garments<s%> smell of <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> and <S%H174>aloes,<s%> and <S%H7102>cassia,<s%> out of the <S%H8127>ivory<s%> <S%H1964>palaces,<s%> <S%H4482>whereby<s%> they have made you <S%H8056>glad.<s%>

<S%H4428>Kings'<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were among your <S%H3368>honorable<s%> women: on your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> did <S%H5324>stand<s%> the <S%H7694>queen<s%> in <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H211>Ophir.<s%>

<S%H8085>Listen,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and <S%H7200>consider,<s%> and <S%H5186>incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear;<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> also your own <S%H5971>people,<s%> and your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%>
So shall the <S%H4428>king<s%> greatly <S%H183>desire<s%> your <S%H3308>beauty:<s%> for he is your <S%H113>Lord;<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> you him.

And the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> shall be there with a <S%H4503>gift;<s%> even the <S%H6223>rich<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H2470>entreat<s%> your <S%H6440>favor.<s%>

She shall be <S%H2986>brought<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H7553>raiment<s%> of <S%H7553>needlework:<s%> the <S%H1330>virgins<s%> her <S%H7464>companions<s%> that <S%H310>follow<s%> her shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> to you.
With <S%H8057>gladness<s%> and <S%H1524>rejoicing<s%> shall they be <S%H2986>brought:<s%> they shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1964>palace.<s%>
<S%H8478>Instead<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall be your <S%H1121>children,<s%> whom you may make <S%H8269>princes<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

I will make your <S%H8034>name<s%> to be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> you for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
